text: -This year I decided to really

get into the spirit
of Halloween.
[ Both scream ]
-No!
-[ Laughs ]

It may have been the costliest
decision I've ever made.
[ Grunts ]

My greased up head went
into the pumpkin

no problem, but...
-It won't budge.
-...I can't get it out.
Try again.

I mean, I could try destroying
the pumpkin...
-Jim, no. No, no, no!
-but as Jim and I discovered..

No.
[ Applause ]

...any blow to the pumpkin
itself could prove fatal to me

At first I drove myself crazy
thinking about the things

I should have done differently
-Yes, Dwight.

-I never should have played
that joke on Erin.

Keyboard.
Never should have hallowed out

this damn pumpkin
in the first place.

But then I realized
I was being silly.
I'm in the pumpkin.

It should rot off of my head
in a month or two. Right?
